title: It Is Here (Part 1)
body:
It Is Here (Part 1)

"Monster tide should be here in around four hours. Should we activate the formations now" a man who looks in his mid forties asked. The man had long white hair and black eyes, his eyebrows were furrowed a little and he was looking at the distance with a solemn face.

The man was hovering in mid air and there was an invisible pressure around his body that make people restless if they look at him for a long time.

The man's name was Damian, and he was the guild master of the 'White Shark' guild which is the platinum rank guild of the Naphliam city, and just like Sabastian, he is also an S rank hunter.

"Let's wait for one more hour before we activate the formations"

Beside Damian, a tall woman with a big chest, and slender waist was hovering. Even though her face was average, her figure was even better than supermodel's because of her training.
